name: Ballista Project
description:
This is a game prototype. I found it a bit fun to play, so I uploaded it here.

You play as a mortar. You shoot tanks. Tanks explode when you shoot them. If a tank makes it up to the left side of the screen, you lose. Each day there are more tanks to come, try to keep 'em away as long as possible.

There are two powerups which you may find useful: blue ones cut reload time by a half, and red ones instantly explode all the tanks on map. The game is endless, possible bugs are everywhere.

Controls are simple:

Left/Right to change shooting angle.

Up/Down to change shooting speed.

Space to shoot.
